name: StreamFlow
about: StreamFlow is a project management application where users can create a profile to manage solo and team projects. Each project allows users to create tasks that can be assigned to users and have due dates and levels of urgency.

name: Subscription Tracker
about: Subscription Tracker is an application that tracks various recurring subscriptions and costs laid out neatly via a list and calendar.

name: Employee Directory
about: Employee Directory is a React application that uses the Random User Generator API to generate a list of users for a fake employee list.

name: Budget Tracker
about: Progressive Web Application budget tracker, allowing you to manage transactions online & offline.

name: Workout Tracker
about: Application that allows users to track their workouts

name: Eat Da Burger!
about: A bugger logger created to ultilize the MVC paradigm

name: Employee Tracker
about: CLI application for managing employees/roles/departments, first project to use MySQL

name: Note Taker
about: Simple note taking app made in JavaScript and Express back-end that writes and save notes to a JSON file

name: Team Profile Generator
about: Team Profile Generator is a CLI application that takes in information about employees on a software engineering team and generates an HTML page that displays their information

name: Laughs & Eats
about: Laughs & Eats lists restaurants in your area along with several jokes to use for your date!

name: Weather Dashboard
about: This application ultilizes the OpenWeather API to show the current weather conditions along with the forcast for the next 5 days. The last 10 cities searched are also saved and stored on the left-hand side of the page.

name: Password Generator
about: Basic password generator generated via prompts

name: Code Quiz
about: A quiz that asks the users questions relating to JavaScript. At the end the user's score is displayed along with a text box to enter their initials.

name: Work Day Scheduler
about: A simple calandar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day.
